description:
The must-have lawn kit for dog lovers

Revive your lawn for pets with urine-resistant seeds and lawn-safe weed control.

Our Pet Lawn Seed & Weed Kit pairs the powerful weed-fighting action of Dandelion Doom with our resilient Pet Lawn Grass Seed, tailored for cool-season growth. This combination not only mends areas damaged by pets but also fosters a denser, greener lawn that withstands pet play. Spend more time playing with your pet, and less time worrying about damage to your grass.

Sunday is dedicated to creating eco-conscious, effective lawn care solutions that care for your lawn, yard, and the world around it.

sections.kit_benefits:
Urine-resistant grass seed over 160 varieties tested for resistance
Durable to pet traffic fescue and perennial ryegrass
A-LIST seed mix certified for high quality and sustainability
Fast-acting herbicide iron-powered formula kills weeds down to the roots
Made for any cool-season lawn ideal for northern and transitional climates
Pet-friendly care made without harmful chemicals
Up to 5,000 sq. ft. of coverage perfect for small to medium-sized yards
sections.whats_included:
2 Pet Lawn Grass Seed: Premium fescue & perennial ryegrass seed mixture. Covers up to 2,500 sq. ft. per bag.
1 Dandelion Doom Herbicide Concentrate: Post-emergent broadleaf weed killer. Covers up to 224 sq. ft. of weeds.
Kit equipment: Reusable lawn hose-end sprayer, reusable herbicide pouch, and battery-operated wand sprayer for easy application.
"Let's Yard Better" Booklet: To help you grow better with Sunday.
sections.instructions:
Apply weed control. Assemble the herbicide starter kit with the pouch, concentrate refill, and wand sprayer. Apply Dandelion Doom to weeds, fully covering leaves for full control. Wait 24 hours to seed your lawn.
Overseed your lawn. Prep the yard by lightly raking the lawn to ensure seed-to-soil contact and optimal growth. Apply seed uniformly across the lawn according to the recommended rate on the label.
Water daily or as needed to keep the soil moist (but not saturated), for optimal seed germination.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Ideally, apply this kit in spring or fall when cool-season grasses grow best. For best results, apply when temperatures range between 55-75 degrees F for grass seed and 50-85 degrees F for weed control.
What weeds does Dandelion Doom control?
Dandelion Doom effectively targets the most common broadleaf weeds in lawns, including dandelions, clovers, chickweed, thistle, creeping charlie, and more. It also controls moss, algae, and lichens, and suppresses common lawn diseases.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes. This kit is designed to complement Sunday lawn and garden products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid product applications for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It's safe to return to normal lawn use after weed control products dry fully. For seed germination, limiting traffic on the newly seeded areas is recommended until the grass is established.
When will I see results?
Weed control results can be visible in a few hours to a few days. Expect grass seed germination in 3-12 days, depending on moisture and temperatures.
Sunday Grass Seed Instructions
Step-by-step instructions on how to seed Sunday's premium cool-season grass seed for a thicker, climate-resilient, and weed-free lawn.
